title: Summer Bean and Sweetcorn Salad
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin red kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '150g (5 oz) fresh or frozen sweetcorn kernels', '1 small onion, diced', '150g (5 oz) cherry tomatoes, halved', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 teaspoon lemon zest (optional)', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'large bunch fresh basil, finely chopped']
